products.name: Pure Magnesium Carbonate
products.description: Premium quality magnesium carbonate perfect for climbing, weightlifting, and gymnastics. Our product contains absolutely nothing but pure magnesium carbonate - no additives, no fillers, no chemicals you can't pronounce. Packaged in convenient 200g bags.
products.shortDescription: Perfect for climbing, weightlifting, and gymnastics. Just pure magnesium carbonate - nothing else.
products.storageInstructions: Store in a cool, dry place. Keep container tightly closed.

seo.title: Pure Magnesium Carbonate 200g - Premium Climbing Chalk
seo.metaDescription: Premium quality magnesium carbonate for climbing, weightlifting, and gymnastics. 200g bag, 100% pure, no additives. Order from Fiedler Family Farmer today.
seo.keywords: magnesium carbonate, climbing chalk, gymnastics chalk, weightlifting grip, pure chalk, 200g

products.name: Premium Ground Beef (1 lb)
products.description: Locally sourced, hormone-free ground beef from farms you can trust. Our cattle are grass-fed and pasture-raised, resulting in superior flavor and nutritional value. Fresh ground daily and never frozen. Sold in convenient 1-pound packages.
products.shortDescription: Locally sourced, hormone-free ground beef. Fresh from farms you can trust.
products.storageInstructions: Keep refrigerated at 40¬∞F or below. Use within 2 days of purchase or freeze for up to 3 months.

seo.title: Premium Grass-Fed Ground Beef 1lb - Locally Sourced
seo.metaDescription: Fresh, hormone-free ground beef from local grass-fed cattle. No antibiotics, superior nutrition and flavor. 1lb package from Fiedler Family Farmer.
seo.keywords: grass-fed beef, ground beef, hormone-free meat, local beef, pasture-raised cattle, 1 pound

products.name: Fiedler Family Farmer T-Shirt
products.description: Represent clean nutrition and sustainable farming with our premium cotton t-shirt. Featuring our signature "Clean Nutrition You Can Trust" design, this comfortable tee is perfect for everyday wear or working in the garden. Printed on-demand via Printify for sustainability.
products.shortDescription: Premium cotton t-shirt with our signature "Clean Nutrition You Can Trust" design.
products.careInstructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low, iron inside out if needed.
products.shippingInfo: Ships within 3-5 business days via Printify fulfillment network.

seo.title: Fiedler Family Farmer T-Shirt - Clean Nutrition Design
seo.metaDescription: Premium cotton t-shirt featuring our "Clean Nutrition You Can Trust" design. Comfortable, sustainable, and perfect for everyday wear. Printed on-demand.
seo.keywords: fiedler family farmer shirt, clean nutrition tshirt, sustainable farming apparel, organic cotton shirt, printify
